word:
"CLEARLY THE DECEPTIONS OF THESE FALSE TEACHERS WERE LAID OPEN BEFORE ME, AND I SAW THE FEARFUL ACCOUNT THAT STOOD AGAINST THEM IN THE BOOK OF RECORDS, AND THE TERRIBLE GUILT THAT RESTED UPON THEM FOR PROFESSING COMPLETE HOLINESS WHILE THEIR DAILY ACTS WERE OFFENSIVE IN THE SIGHT OF GOD."--LIFE SKETCHES, PP. 83, 84. 
                                                                           302
